message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product. I believe it holds significant value for you. I'm initially offering it at $1,000,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. Can we meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $700,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $900,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
I still think $900,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to go up to $750,000, but I'd like to see some flexibility from you. Can you meet me at $750,000?
